anonymous.label: Anonymous
anonymous.tooltip: The rating will be anonymous. No user information will be recorded.

resultViewable.label: Result Viewable
resultViewable.tooltip: The result will be viewable to raters and general public, if anonymous on.

private.label: Private Rating
private.tooltip: The rating will be private. You must invite raters from the friends.

restrictedLocation.label: Restrict Location
restrictedLocation.tooltip: Restrict where the rating is acccessible from.

title.minlength: A title must be greater than 1 character.
title.maxlength: A title must be less then 250 characters.

description.minlength: A description must be greate than 1 character.
description.maxlength: A description must be less then 250 characters.

messages.success: Registration saved! Please check your email for confirmation.

error.userexists: Login name already registered! Please choose another one.
error.emailexists: E-mail is already in use! Please choose another one.
